scripts.build-cordova: cross-env TARGET=cordova cross-env NODE_ENV=production node ./build/build.js && cd cordova && cordova build
scripts.build-cordova-ios: cross-env TARGET=cordova cross-env NODE_ENV=production node ./build/build.js && cd cordova && cordova build ios
scripts.cordova-ios: cross-env TARGET=cordova cross-env NODE_ENV=development node ./build/build.js && cd cordova && cordova run ios
scripts.build-cordova-android: cross-env TARGET=cordova cross-env NODE_ENV=production node ./build/build.js && cd cordova && cordova build android
scripts.cordova-android: cross-env TARGET=cordova cross-env NODE_ENV=development node ./build/build.js && cd cordova && cordova run android
scripts.diji-debug: cross-env TARGET=cordova cross-env NODE_ENV=production node ./build/build.js && cd cordova &&  cordova run android
scripts.diji-singed: cross-env TARGET=cordova cross-env NODE_ENV=production node ./build/build.js && cd cordova &&  cordova run android --release -- --keystore=../yolcu_key.keystore --storePassword=333666 --alias=yolcu --password=444666
